column5: Hey I have a question for any locals out there can you pm Me if  you've fished it recently. Thanks.
Friggin COLD ! I learned to water ski on it when I was 10 years old. You won't fall more than twice.. I can tell  you that!
Speaking of water sking, being Cold and Otter Lake in Smith Falls....Heres a dude water sking on Otter Lake October 10th 2009 at 11:23 am
I fished it last year and have about a dozen times in the past.  PM away..  RJ
